column1: Smoque BBQ////Love this place! Have tried the pulled pork
column2: baby back ribs and the chopped brisket.  They are all delicious
column3: my personal favorite probably the pulled pork.  The sauces also fit well with each dish.  The french fries as a side are crispy and delicious.  The peach cobbler also very tasty.  If you are going with a few people best to each get something different and share with each other to get a little bit of everything!!!
